Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I'm using the "Clothing Library v2" on my game and it works great, but I'm having a problem with an error message.

Error running script: Error compiling expression 'item.worn = true and HasAttribute(item,"wear_slots")': CompareElement: Operation 'Equal' is not defined for types 'Object' and 'Boolean'

I tried to fix it by myself, but I didn't succeed, so, if this has happened to you before, I would like you to tell me how to fix it. Thanks in advance.
Posts.HTML:

OK, I found the bug. Try it with this version of the wearables lib

Posts.EditableText: I still get that error message. Not always, for example, sometimes I can wear and remove any piece of cloth perfectly normal, but then, I try to wear it again, and I can't.
Posts.HTML: I still get that error message. Not always, for example, sometimes I can wear and remove any piece of cloth perfectly normal, but then, I try to wear it again, and I can't.

Posts.EditableText: You have copied the function DoWear from the wearables.lib into your game. Do you really need this function there? I can't see any changes in it. So if you delete this function in your game it should work.
Posts.HTML: You have copied the function DoWear from the wearables.lib into your game. Do you really need this function there? I can't see any changes in it. So if you delete this function in your game it should work.

Posts.EditableText: Ok, now it perfectly works. Thank you for your help and your time.
Posts.HTML: Ok, now it perfectly works. Thank you for your help and your time.
